subtitleNullable: Cartoon Set is a collection of random, 2D cartoon avatar images.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

All credit for this dataset goes to the Google Team who built this dataset.

See the official page for the dataset here --> [Cartoon Set](https://google.github.io/cartoonset/index.html)

''
Cartoon Set is a collection of random, 2D cartoon avatar images. The cartoons vary in 10 artwork categories, 4 color categories, and 4 proportion categories, with a total of ~1013 possible combinations. We provide sets of 10k and 100k randomly chosen cartoons and labeled attributes.
''

### Content

The original images are in a PNG format, but I converted them to a JPG format to limit the amount of memory used to store the images. There are 10 subfolders that each contain 10k of the 100k images. Each image is 500x500 pixels. 

### Supporting Datasets

10/21/2023: [@kirkdco](https://www.kaggle.com/kirkdco) provides a great supporting dataset with attribute information for each image. dataset [here](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/kirkdco/google-cartoon-faces-attributes).

### Inspiration

I would love to see some GAN models built with this dataset. That being said, I would love to see anything creative that comes from this dataset. Experiment away!
title: Cartoon Faces (Google's Cartoon Set)
subtitle: Cartoon Set is a collection of random, 2D cartoon avatar images.
description:
### Context

All credit for this dataset goes to the Google Team who built this dataset.

See the official page for the dataset here --> [Cartoon Set](https://google.github.io/cartoonset/index.html)

''
Cartoon Set is a collection of random, 2D cartoon avatar images. The cartoons vary in 10 artwork categories, 4 color categories, and 4 proportion categories, with a total of ~1013 possible combinations. We provide sets of 10k and 100k randomly chosen cartoons and labeled attributes.
''

### Content

The original images are in a PNG format, but I converted them to a JPG format to limit the amount of memory used to store the images. There are 10 subfolders that each contain 10k of the 100k images. Each image is 500x500 pixels. 

### Supporting Datasets

10/21/2023: [@kirkdco](https://www.kaggle.com/kirkdco) provides a great supporting dataset with attribute information for each image. dataset [here](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/kirkdco/google-cartoon-faces-attributes).

### Inspiration

I would love to see some GAN models built with this dataset. That being said, I would love to see anything creative that comes from this dataset. Experiment away!
